vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1, approved as to form by the City Attorney, to the service agreement with HR&A Advisors, Inc. for analytical, strategic and community planning consultant services to: (1) update the Scope of Services to include matters related to the implementation of the City of Dallas Economic Development Policy; (2) extend the term from January 1, 2023 to December 31, 2023; and (3) increase the overall contract amount by $1,022,000.00, from $1,296,000.00 to $2,318,000.00 - Not to exceed $1,022,000.00 - Financing: Public/Private Partnership Fund ($114,800.00) and General Fund ($907,200.00)
vote.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1, approved as to form by the City Attorney, to the service agreement with HR&A Advisors, Inc. for analytical, strategic and community planning consultant services to: (1) update the Scope of Services to include matters related to the implementation of the City of Dallas Economic Development Policy; (2) extend the term from January 1, 2023 to December 31, 2023; and (3) increase the overall contract amount by $1,022,000.00, from $1,296,000.00 to $2,318,000.00 - Not to exceed $1,022,000.00 - Financing: Public/Private Partnership Fund ($114,800.00) and General Fund ($907,200.00)
